ActorTalk: Sorry, sorry! Please wait just a bit longer! It's been a busy day today, and I have no idea where our boss put the souvenirs...
Or is Ross not in the shop today?
Huh? You didn't know? I thought you two were close, so I figured he would've already asked you for help or something.
Well... I can't say for sure, but we're all pretty sure something's been bothering him. Something serious.
Something serious? How bad is it?
We don't know exactly. He won't talk about it, but it's clearly related to the shop.
One time, I saw him looking really worried. I think I even heard him muttering about what to do with the future of Kuroro Coffee...
Anyway, it's hard to explain all at once. But lately, he's been in a bad state. Looks like he hasn't slept in days.
If there's anything I can help with, I'll do what I can.
Really? That would be amazing, thank you so much!
The manager's always been good to all of us. We hate seeing him like this...
Once today's rush is over, feel free to come to me or Haley if you need anything. We want to help too.
Ah, so they were shoved way in the back. No wonder I couldn't find them.
Whew... got them. Here you go, [PlayerName].
The rewards for the event and the check-in task will be mailed to you later. But for now, you can take printed copies of your check-in photos with you.
It's a special bonus we've prepared for you. Please accept them.
Now that we've got the souvenirs, let's get ready to go, Commandant.
Why not ask him directly?
Help? Did something happen to Mr. Ross?
He hasn't contacted me lately.
Don't worry. I'll talk to him and see what's going on.
Thanks. I will.
Thank you very much.
